highlights.headline: Brunson's 32-point night keeps Knicks alive in ECF
highlights.description: Jalen Brunson stands tall for New York as they overcome the Indiana Pacers in Game 5 to keep the series alive.

highlights.headline: Brunson, Towns star as Knicks force Game 6 vs. Pacers
highlights.description: The Knicks avoid elimination with an impressive 111-94 victory over the Pacers in Game 5.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Brunson, Towns star as Knicks force Game 6 vs. Pacers) 2025/05/29 ESHEET SOTFULL

video.headline: Brunson, Towns star as Knicks force Game 6 vs. Pacers

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Brunson, Towns star as Knicks force Game 6 vs. Pacers) 2025/05/29 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: — From Jalen Brunson's sizzling start to the “Knicks in 7! Knicks in 7!” chants at the finish, this was New York's night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brunson, Towns carry Knicks to 111-94 victory that cuts Pacers' series lead to 3-2

events.name: Indiana Pacers at New York Knicks
